Class Rhombus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape2D
      • ComplexShape
        • Parallelogram
          • Rhombus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Translatable

    public class Rhombus
extends Parallelogram
    [Rhombus.java] The class represents the rhombus shape, which inherits directly from the parallelogram class. All rhombuses have a base, height and coordinates for reference.
    Version:
    1.0, Oct 9, 2020
    Author:
    Braydon Wang

      Constructors

      Rhombus(java.lang.String type, int x, int y, int base, int height)
      Creates an object from the Rhombus class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rhombus

        Rhombus(java.lang.String type,
        int x,
        int y,
        int base,
        int height)
        Creates an object from the Rhombus class.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the shape
        x - the x coordinate of the rhombus' reference point
        y - the y coordinate of the rhonbus' reference point
        base - the base length of the rhombus
        height - the height of the rhombus
